# error

**Instance Property**

An error that describes the cause of a failure.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` unless the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayer/status] property of the player item is [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayerStatus/failed]. When playback fails, the error indicates the reason for the failure.

## Getting Information About the Player

- **currentItem**: The player’s current item.
- **status**: The status of the player.
title: error
